issue.title: [C++/Python] Provide access to "custom_metadata" Field attribute in IPC setting
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-483](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-483). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This will make it easier to write adapters for custom data types embedded in built-in Arrow types

comments.body:
